name: Bear Gryllis vs Teddy Roosevelt
description:
Straight from TrainJam 2017! Bear Gryllis vs Teddy Roosevelt is a 2-player 2D platformer survival game. You must collect mystery items to defeat your opponent! Will you get the spiked helmet? The balloon sword of magic? Or maybe just poison yourself? Feel the unexpected anticipation!

This game was created by:

Andrew Tavis (programming) - @artavis

Adam Spector (programming) - @aspector247

Rebecca McConnell (art) - @Purple_Draws
